SMART_QA_EDITOR.SMARTQA_SATISFACTION_CONFLICT: Smart QA satisfaction conflicting with answer form
SMART_QA_EDITOR.SATISFACTION_TOOLTIP: Smart QA is linked with Smart QA satisfication, and every channel's answer form cannot contain Json.
SMART_QA_EDITOR.LABEL_GRAY_HINT: Gray means that the labeling has no data.
SMART_QA_EDITOR.LABEL_GREEN_HINT: Green means that the labeling has data.

CONFIRM_DIALOG.TITLE: The operation is about to reset the screen

PUSH_NOTIFICATION.IDLE_TIMEOUT: The current idle timeout disconnection time is
PUSH_NOTIFICATION.TITLE: Title
PUSH_NOTIFICATION.TIMEOUT_PUSH_MESSAGE: The current push message when it is disconnected
PUSH_NOTIFICATION.FIELD_REQUIRED_INTEGER: This is a required field, only integer numbers can be entered
PUSH_NOTIFICATION.CONFIRM_FIELD: Please confirm the required field information
PUSH_NOTIFICATION.IDLE_TIME_CANNOT_LESS: Idle time (minutes) cannot be less than 1 (minutes)
PUSH_NOTIFICATION.IDLE_TIME_MUST_LESS: Idle time (minutes) must be less than
PUSH_NOTIFICATION.IDLE_TIME_MUST_DIFFERENT: and push message can not exist with the same idle time(minutes)
PUSH_NOTIFICATION.IDLE_TIME_MUST_INTEGER: Idle time (minutes) must be an integer

COMMON.TRIGGER_RELOAD: The operation is about to reset the data
COMMON.DAMAGED_FILE: This file is damaged, please upload another file again.
COMMON.UPLOAD_MAX_LIMITED_ERROR: The upload file size has exceeded the limit.
COMMON.LABEL_GRAY_HINT: Gray means that the labeling has no data.
COMMON.LABEL_GREEN_HINT: Green means that the labeling has data.
COMMON.MAX_MIN_HAS_BIGGER_ZERO: Both the maximum and minimum values ​​must be greater than zero.
COMMON.MAX_HAS_BIGGER_THAN_MIN: The maximum value cannot be less than the minimum value.
COMMON.IG_NO_QUICK_REPLY: Quick Reply is not supported when the Instagram channel last answer non-text format

PLACEHOLDER.AUDIO_URL: Please enter the audio url. Example : https://
PLACEHOLDER.CARD_TEXT_TO_SPEECH: text to speech required. Limit 40 words, the first card is active only.
PLACEHOLDER.EXTERNAL_URL: Please enter the external url. Example : http:// or https://
PLACEHOLDER.IMAGE_URL: Please enter the image url. Example : https://
PLACEHOLDER.LINK_URL: Please enter the link url. Example : https://
PLACEHOLDER.FILE_URL: Please enter the file url. Example : https://
PLACEHOLDER.IMAGE_CLICK_URL: Please enter the image click url. Example : https://
PLACEHOLDER.IMAGE_THUMBNAIL_URL: Please enter the thumbnail image url. Example : https://
PLACEHOLDER.REPLY_DISPLAY_TEXT: Please enter the word. The word will show on the channel.
PLACEHOLDER.URL: Please enter the url. Example : https://
PLACEHOLDER.VIDEO_URL: Please enter the video url. Example : https://
PLACEHOLDER.VOICE_TEXTAREA: Please enter voice's content and limit 500 words.
PLACEHOLDER.MEDIACARD_FB_URL: Please enter the full FB URL including https://
PLACEHOLDER.QUOTE_SMARTQA: Please click here to quote Smart QA.
PLACEHOLDER.TEXT_IMAGE: Please enter the text after clicking the picture.

AUDIO.MESSENGER_LIMIT: Messenger need upload complete in 60 seconds.
AUDIO.GOOGLE_LIMIT: OK Google support MP3 files only.
AUDIO.AUDIO_LIMIT: Suppoert MP3、M4A audio files and file size need to be under 10MB.

TEXT.MESSAGE_AFTER_CLICK: The reply message after clicking Smart QA satisfaction
TEXT.FIELD_LENGTH_LIMIT: The length of this field is limited to 2000 words
TEXT.GOOGLE_DEFAULT_TEXT: The content of the rhetorical question will be automatically brought here

IMAGE.MESSENGER_LIMIT: Set channel-specific format by Messenger & Instagram channel
IMAGE.MESSENGER_NO_PREVIEW: Messenger & Instagram no upload preview support
IMAGE.MESSENGER_NO_LINKIMAGE: Messenger & Instagram no upload linkImage support
IMAGE.IMAGE_LIMIT_PRE: File size need to be under

VIDEO.VIDEO_LIMIT: Support MP4 Video and file size need to be under 10 MB.
VIDEO.IMAGE_LIMIT: File size need to be under 10 MB.
VIDEO.PREVIEW_IMAGE_LIMIT: File size need to be under 1 MB.
VIDEO.MESSENGER_LIMIT: Messenger don't support to set thumbnail.
VIDEO.VIDEO_HINT: Need to be an MP4 video file under 1 minute and under 10 MB
VIDEO.IMAGE_HINT: Need to be an image file under 1 MB

REPLY.SMARTQA_SATISFACTION_SURVEY: The items of Smart QA satisfaction survey

FILE.FILE_LIMIT: The file size is less than 3 MB

JSON.JSON_LIMIT: This answer type supports only the native format for this pass

QUOTE.QUOTE_REMIND: If the Quote Smart QA's answer is not supported by this channel, it may not be able to reply normally!

PLAY.ERROR_EMPTY_OBJ: Please enter in the correct parameters, it cannot be an empty object.
PLAY.ERROR_JSON_FORMAT: The format does not match, this field only supports JSON format.
PLAY.RHETORICAL_QUESTION_TOOLTIP: The content of the concatenated sentence needs to be set in the Phone Connector. The default value is'您還有甚麼問題想詢問嗎? 想參考其他問題，可以說查詢主選單'. The concatenated sentence will be automatically added after reading the answer.
PLAY.FIXED_AUDIO_TOOLTIP: Please enter the file url in text field when it use Audio
PLAY.INTERRUPT_NO_CLEAR_BUFFER: Can be interrupted without clearing the buffer.
PLAY.ASR_AFTER_PLAY_FINISH: Play the sound first, and start voice recognition after the sound is played.
PLAY.PLAY_INTERRUPT_AFTER_RECOGNITION_RESULT: The playback and voice recognition start at the same time, and the playback will be interrupted when there is a recognition result.
PLAY.PLAY_INTERRUPT_WHEN_START_RECOGNITION: The playback and voice recognition start at the same time. When the recognition starts, the playback is interrupted. When the recognition starts, wait for the recognition result to return, otherwise wait for the recognition to time out and then return.
PLAY.COMMAND_Q_TOOLTIP: When playing background sound, send the content of this field to Gateway.
PLAY.TIMEOUT_Q_TOOLTIP: When background sound timeout, send the content of this field to Gateway.
PLAY.DTMF_STRING_TOOLTIP: When the key is received, it will be compared with the key number. If the comparison is successful, the corresponding smart question will be sent to the Gateway. only use up to 9 groups of keys corresponding to smart questions.
PLAY.BACKGROUND_SOUND_TOOLTIP: Please set the total time to be less than the QbiCRM Gateway timeout time, otherwise it will cause a timeout during the broadcast and interrupt the chat room. The background sound can only use up to 10 audio files.
PLAY.PH_DTMF_LENGTH: Please enter a number in the range of 1 ~ 20.
PLAY.PH_MIN: Please enter the minimum code length.
PLAY.PH_MAX: Please enter the maximum code length.
PLAY.PH_INT: This field only supports positive integers.
PLAY.PH_DTMF: Please enter a positive integer with a maximum length of 20 digits.
PLAY.PH_INTERVAL: This field only supports positive integers.
PLAY.PH_MUSIC: Only supports 8k 16bit mono and the file extension is mp3, wav audio files.
PLAY.ATLEASTE_ONE_MUSIC: Please set at least one background music.
PLAY.ENABLE_BACKGROUND_SOUND_TOOLTIP: Enable background sound, no need to set text box.

VERIFY_SERVICE.HAS_HTTPS: Please enter the full URL including https://
VERIFY_SERVICE.HAS_HTTP: Please enter the full URL including http:// or https://
VERIFY_SERVICE.MAXSIZE_LIMIT: The maximum limit for uploading files is
VERIFY_SERVICE.IS_FB_URL: Please enter the full FB URL including https://
VERIFY_SERVICE.NUMBER_RANGE: Please enter a number in the range of
VERIFY_SERVICE.LINE_CARD_SUBTITLE: Since any card in the LINE channel has a subtitle filled in, this field is required
VERIFY_SERVICE.GOOGLE_CARD_FILE: Fill in at least one of this field and the card description text
VERIFY_SERVICE.GOOGLE_CARD_SUBTITLE: Fill in at least one of this field and a picture

TAB_COMPONENT.CLONE_NOT_SUPPORT_TYPE: This copy format contains unsupported formats.
TAB_COMPONENT.LINE_LIMIT: LINE channel unsupport MediaCard type and File type.
TAB_COMPONENT.INSTAGRAM_LIMIT: Instagram channel does not support image with link format, audio format, file format, video format and multimedia card format
TAB_COMPONENT.VERIFY_INVAILD: Please check all answer is complete.
TAB_COMPONENT.CLEAR_ANSWER: Are you sure to clear all answers on this tab?
TAB_COMPONENT.CHANNEL_ALERT: only keep the first answer of the copied channel. If it does not meet the format supported by the channel, the answer will be cleared to blank text format.
TAB_COMPONENT.UNABLE_CLONE: This is a special format and cannot be copied

LABELEDITOR.HINT: After confirming, remember to save the question or answer for it to take effect.
LABELEDITOR.PLACEHOLDER_KEY: Please enter the parameter Ex. Features
LABELEDITOR.PLACEHOLDER_VALUE: Please enter the parameter value. Ex. Mild
LABELEDITOR.POPOVER_LABEL: Label variable: Can accumulate and have multiple label variable values ​​at the same time.
LABELEDITOR.POPOVER_CUSTOM_VARIABLE: Custom variable: Only one custom variable value can be owned at the same time, the custom variable value collected later will replace the former.
